name: Accio
description: Summons an object from a distance to the caster, regardless of obstacles.

name: Alohomora
description: Unlocks doors, windows, and other objects locked by mundane means.

name: Aparecium
description: Reveals invisible ink or hidden writings on a surface.

name: Ascendio
description: Propels the caster or target rapidly upwards, useful for escaping deep areas.

name: Avada Kedavra
description: The Killing Curse causes instant death without pain; one of the Unforgivable Curses.

name: Avis
description: Conjures a flock of small birds that fly from the caster's wand tip.

name: Bat-Bogey Hex
description: Transforms a target's mucus into large bat-like creatures that attack them.

name: Bubble-Head Charm
description: Creates a bubble of air around the head, allowing underwater breathing.

name: Colloportus
description: Magically seals doors so they cannot be opened by conventional means.

name: Confringo
description: Causes the target to violently explode, often with fire and debris.

name: Confundo
description: Confuses and disorients the target, making them susceptible to suggestion.

name: Crucio
description: The Cruciatus Curse inflicts unbearable pain on the victim; another Unforgivable Curse.

name: Defodio
description: Gouges or digs into the target surface, used to tunnel through materials like rock or earth.

name: Deletrius
description: Erases magical effects, such as spell echoes or traces.

name: Densaugeo
description: Causes the target's teeth to grow rapidly and grotesquely long.

name: Descendo
description: Forces the target object or person to descend or fall downwards.

name: Diffindo
description: Slices through objects such as fabric, rope, or paper with precision.

name: Duro
description: Turns the target object into solid stone, rendering it immobile and hard.

name: Engorgio
description: Enlarges the target object or creature significantly in size.

name: Episkey
description: Heals minor injuries such as cuts, bruises, or a broken nose.

name: Evanesco
description: Vanishes the target object, removing it from existence completely.

name: Expelliarmus
description: Disarms an opponent by forcing them to release whatever they are holding.

name: Expulso
description: Causes a violent explosion that blasts the target apart.

name: Ferula
description: Conjures bandages and splints to bind and support injured body parts.

name: Fidelius Charm
description: Hides a secret within a person's soul, making it undiscoverable unless the Secret Keeper reveals it.

name: Finite
description: Ends ongoing spell effects currently in place.

name: Finite Incantatem
description: Terminates multiple spell effects or counters minor magical disturbances.

name: Flagrate
description: Allows the caster to write in the air with fire, leaving a glowing trail.

name: Flipendo
description: Knocks the target backward; used to push or stun creatures and objects.

name: Furnunculus
description: Causes the victim to break out in boils or painful skin conditions.

name: Geminio
description: Duplicates the target object; duplicates may multiply uncontrollably.

name: Glisseo
description: Turns stairs into a smooth slide-like surface for rapid descent.

name: Homenum Revelio
description: Reveals the presence of nearby humans, even if hidden or under Invisibility Cloaks.

name: Immobulus
description: Freezes objects or creatures in place, preventing any movement.

name: Impedimenta
description: Slows down or halts a target, useful for stalling attackers.

name: Imperio
description: Places the victim under complete control of the caster's will; an Unforgivable Curse.

name: Impervius
description: Repels water, mist, and dirt from the target's surface.

name: Incendio
description: Produces fire from the caster's wand tip to ignite objects.

name: Legilimens
description: Allows the caster to delve into the thoughts or memories of the target.

name: Levicorpus
description: Dangles the target upside down in the air by their ankle.

name: Liberacorpus
description: Releases a target from the effects of Levicorpus.

name: Lumos
description: Illuminates the tip of the wand, acting like a flashlight.

name: Muffliato
description: Fills nearby ears with a buzzing sound to prevent eavesdropping.

name: Nox
description: Extinguishes the light produced by the Lumos spell.

name: Obliviate
description: Erases or modifies the target's memories.

name: Petrificus Totalus
description: Temporarily paralyzes the target, leaving them frozen stiff.

name: Portus
description: Turns an object into a Portkey capable of transporting people.

name: Protego
description: Creates a magical barrier that deflects spells and physical attacks.

name: Reducto
description: Blasts solid objects into pieces or reduces them to dust.

name: Relashio
description: Forces whatever is holding or restraining the caster to let go.

name: Rennervate
description: Revives a person who has been stunned or knocked unconscious.

name: Reparo
description: Repairs broken objects like glass, pottery, or books.

name: Rictusempra
description: Tickles the target mercilessly, often causing disarming laughter.

name: Ridikkulus
description: Transforms a Boggart into something humorous to defeat it.

name: Scourgify
description: Cleans objects or surfaces magically.

name: Sectumsempra
description: Causes deep gashes to appear on the target, as if slashed by a sword.

name: Silencio
description: Silences the target, preventing them from making any sound.

name: Sonorus
description: Amplifies the caster's voice so it can be heard over long distances.

name: Stupefy
description: Stuns the target, rendering them unconscious for a short time.

name: Tarantallegra
description: Forces the target to dance uncontrollably.

name: Waddiwasi
description: Shoots small objects at high speed toward a specific target.

name: Wingardium Leviosa
description: Levitate and control small to medium objects in mid-air.
